title: LI 4 Savings Banks and Savings and Loan Associations
content:
LI 4 Savings Banks and Savings and Loan Associations

State Regulations
§ 4.1 - Leeway investments, version 2
§ 4.2 - Savings bank not permitted to remove trustee automatically upon his separation from his position as an officer, version 2
§ 4.3 - Crediting dividends on date of deposit-date of withdrawal accounts, version 2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
